content.detailedDescription: I was asleep when a disturbance caused by the dogs across the road from where i live. the dogs across the road have been a constant problem for people trying to get asleep, so i have been making complaints to the noise patrol about noise nuisance. the dogs are very noisy anytime night and day. i had been filming dogs making a noise as evidence. a few weeks later i was transfering video footage from my smartcard to my netbook. going through the footage i came across this recording. at the time when i did this i was not aware of the lights in the sky as i was more focused recording the noise acrooss the road.I was just standing there with the camera in my hands. i have seen ufos twice before in my teenage years. the first time i viewed it i was a bit spooked.Just for yourselves what these lights are.I have seen similar sightings all around the world on you-tube and other sites as well.
content.summary: Dogs barking in the early hours of the morning.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at waters edge on lake winnipesaukee with 3 friends(one of these people was a captain of the police) at approximately 9:30 in the evening on the of 8/7/2013.  out of no where a ultra bright white square/rectangle moved across the water from left to right.  object was at tree hieght and approximately 50 feet out in front of us over the water.  moving rapidly it blinked out after a few seconds.  it caught us all by surprise as it was extremely bright and of good size.  no sound was heard.
content.summary: Very bright white square/rectangle moving horizontally across water at tree height

content.detailedDescription:
At 2:40 am august 11 2013 i saw an orange light apparently moving straight upwards in the sky west of belmont,mi.  this lasted  over a minute and faded. almost immediatly a white object with a tail started in the same spot in the sky(30-40 degrees above horizon) and lasted for about 3 seconds. 
i was on my porch. 
i happened to be facing west and was trying to guess if it was an airplane or helicopter but the color was not consistant with either of these. 
it really seemed like it may have been a launch of some kind with a first stage seperation as i could clearly see debris trailing from the second object. 
it is a partly cloudy night and i thought it may have gotten lost in the clouds so i kept looking at the breaks in the clouds along the flightpath and saw nothing  the first object did appear to decrease in size or be moving very quickly.
content.summary: Ascending orange object in west mi. sky followed by smaller white object  two minutes durration total

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i went to veterans memorial park next to 7 mile bridge to watch meteor shower, when we saw across and above road in the north sky a what appeared to be a star grow very bright as if casting its own light south wards towards the direction we were facing (north) and then grew dimmer back to star-like brightness whilst remaining stationary, before it began to slowly move east.  as it began to move, we observed another object of same dim star-like brightness approx. 2 inches above and diagonal from it move eastward with the first object at a slow rate of speed.  object resembled pyramid-triangle formation, but missing (or we could not see) the lower right point of the triangle.  objects appeared to move slowly to the east over & parallel to the ocean while surrounding stars remained stationary, however it covered the distance of what appeared to be 10 miles(?) before fading completely from visibility without ascending or descending .  lights from object or objects did not blink or have any indication that they were known aircraft and no sound was heard.  lights appeared to be too far apart from each other to be plane , unless actual close-up wingspan would be 10 miles apart from tip to tip (speculation based on distance apart from each other and other constellations (eye-view) in sky.  presumably, if lights made up one single object, it would be an extremely large object!!!! (size of a small state)
content.summary: Stationary non blinking lights, one grew bright and both began to move in parallel

content.detailedDescription: Was on beach around 10:30 was watching meteor shower with fianc��� and son. i saw some good meteor showers. spotted one by a star around 12 am. the star seem to move. thought i was crazy. so i stopped and stared at it. and it seem to hover in a circle. i immediately got my fianc��� to look at it to see if she seen the same thing to make sure i wasn't nuts. she seen it too and asked me what it was i said i don't know. than it faded out and came back on but kept moving in weird patterns. obviously very fast giving the high altitude it was at. she asked me if i thought it was a helicopter. i told her it was impossible. it moved way too fast. and the stop and start of this object was too fast. if i wasn't looking for meteors i would have never would have noticed it. was wondering if anyone else had seen this or if possibly the military had something going on around this time. is near the lakewood base and mcguire base. also would like to know if anyone else spotted this. i really never seen anything like this and i am not a believer in ufos but i cannot explain this hoping someone has a explanation
content.summary: Star-like

content.detailedDescription: We took our new jeep wrangler out tonight for a night time drive without the top, in hopes of viewing the meteor shower that was supposed to take place. i was already looking up to the sky in anticipation. we were sitting at the stop light at pioneer ave, waiting to turn left on w liberty ave, when i noticed a big orange flickering light rising above the treetops, it shot quickly to the left. the light reminded me of a floating lantern, but much bigger. my fiancee was driving & got a good look about the time i noticed the light shoot past 3 other red/orange pulsating lights. i then noticed the objects seemed to follow & form an obtuse scalene triangle. slowly the 4th light disappeared & the other red orange lights moved in to make a tighter triangle. it took more than a minute or so for the shape to form. it was at that time i spent approx 20-30 seconds searching the back seat for my camera. when i started recording we were still at the stop light & the mysterious lights remained relatively stationary for about 30 more seconds. as the light changed i kept shooting through the open roof of our jeep. as we moved past the buildings & street lights, it stayed in focus, all the while pulsating red & orange. we drove down the street for another minute or two, filming the objects flicker in the sky, still in triangle formation. at about the same time, 2 lights disappeared, & left one red/orange light, which seemed to get brighter before i eventually lost sight of it. the entire sighting lasted less than 5 minutes but left us feeling certain we had seen something out of the ordinary. i have no clue of the origin of the lights or if they actually created a bigger object, but it seemed as so, did not look like anything i had ever seen before in the sky. it left us feeling certain we had just witnessed a ufo.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Through the open roof of our jeep, we witnessed 4 mysterious red/orange pulsating lights that came together to form a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: While watching the perseid meteor shower in ithaca, ny on saturday night august 10th 2013 we saw a nice shooting star and a few seconds later a ufo and then another shooting star. what we saw was set of 6-8 chevron shaped lights that made up shape up an arrow. the chevron shaped lights were slotted much like the lights shining through a partially opened blind. the color of the light was a dull bluish white light except at the ends of the chevron's where it appeared more of a greenish glow. the lights looked more reflective than glowing in the other areas almost as if it had a searchlight shining up at it and a reflective tape shining back. there were no searchlights or anything else shining at it though. the intensity of the lights were just slightly more than the stars. now take that description and add a slight grayish fog to it in the unlit areas. it blocked out stars behind its shape at it glided over and you could kinda tell it was one complete object.  we first spotted it almost straight overhead moving quickly from east to west. we only saw it for a few seconds and it disappeared well before it should have been out of sight since we were still looking up at it. it made no noise whatsoever. it was an incredible experience for the both of us who saw it. it left us stunned for a while. we really wanted to see it again.
content.summary: Arrow shaped cluster

content.detailedDescription: I go outside to smoke every night and these strange lights are always over the superstition mountains. there out there all night every night i know there not air plains because there are obviously plains all around them this is the first night i have seen more than one they do not have the flashing safety lights that aircraft have they get brighter and darker. they seem to get darker when other aircraft is around. they just fly around the mountain. there is one that is brighter than the rest that seems to not move too much there are smaller ones that seem to come out of it that fly around some times they are in some kind of formation. i'm not going to say that they are deffanently not from earth because i don't know which is why i'm reporting it i don't know they don't appear to be plains because they don't have the flashing lights that plains. i have not lost sight of it yet. the only feeling i have is curiosity i would like to talk to a ufo hunter about this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Been seeing strange lights over superstition mts. for the past week

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the alleyway behind a pizza shop talking to my friend on the phone about spiritual transcendence in the 8 o clock hour in emeryville, california..Where it is usually very bright being in the middle of berkeley and oakland.  i was staring off  to the south direction and saw this bright light very far away 'shoot off' in a curved path..Kind of like a hill path/swivel moving from the south to the west. moving in this path, it disappears. this was very quick-only a matter of seconds. i decided to not think too much of it(because the oak airport was in that direction) even though it gave me a weird feeling. so about 15 minutes later im starting due east and above the building i saw the same bright light again and same distance away(very far) flash and shoot straight up and dissappear again.  at that point i'd known it was strange.  i continue to search the area while still on the phone with my friend speaking very excitedly about it. at 8:54 pm it reappears maybe 3 thumbs up from where it last appeared and then i watched it for maybe a minute or so move out of the earth's atmosphere going south east from my vision. i did not see it again. i had the suspecting feeling it was not 3 different objects but 1 that kept moving.

the strange thing was is that i had planned to go to a ufo conference the next day by uc berkeley. what's also weird is the people holding this conference kept running into me all week as they were putting up flyers. i went to the conference...They were very..Hm, strange creatures. (to not go into detail..)
content.summary: Bright light(s) flash then disappear and eventually flies off to outerspace

content.detailedDescription: It was late october 2012, cannot remember exact date. it was 930 at night i was walking from my garage to my house i just happened to look up and noticed two extremely bright lights one of them red, one green moving east to west in a staggered formation. the lights were moving at an extremely high rate of speed. i estimate the altitude of the objects are between five and 10,000 feet, but possibly much lower. no sound was emitted. the flight path was directly over my location. when the lights were about 45 degrees to the west both disappeared. at my estimated altitude and the rate of movement i estimate a speed of 4000 mph. the sky was clear and the weather was calm. at my location i can observe commercial airliners at lower altitudes on ascent and desent to and from eppley. i am absolutely positive this event was not an airplane.
content.summary: Observed two extremely brights lights, one red, one green moving west in a staggered formation.

content.detailedDescription: Many orbs moved around each other in an unorganized manor in the early night sky. 3 met in the shape of a triangle and the triangle expanded as they traveled together. the orbs eventually got dimmer and faded.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Close to 10 orbs moving around in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: My son was in the living room and glanced out the front window "ma, come quick-ya gotta see this." so i go to the living room and we went out to the front porch.  we saw 2 glowing orbs just hanging above the treeline.  they were moving slowly-then another one appeared and then 2 more. they were all reddish orange in color. i told him i've been waiting to see a ufo my whole life (i've always believed).  we both thought it was pretty cool, not scarey or anything.  anyway, after about 12 or 15 mins. of observing them they just sort of blinked out.  there was no noise or perhaps they were just too far away.  we knew these weren't planes form the get go.  well, that concludes my first ufo experience as of 8/10/13.  by the way happy meteor showers!
content.summary: Saw 2 glowing orbs, then another appeared, then 2 more totalling 5

content.detailedDescription: At 2150 hrs. on august 10, 2013, my wife and i while riding in a southerly direction on our motorcycle observed two redish-orange brightly glowing objects following one another.  the two objects were to the east of us very slowly, barely moving, one behind the other heading in a northeast direction.  the objects were so brightly glowing that they almost looked as though they were a type of firework in the sky that did not dissipate.  there was absolutely no blinking of lights, or changing in the intensity of their glow.  i motioned with my arm and hand to other drivers directly behind me and oncoming to look up.  i within a minute after first spotting the objects, pulled off of the road to the right upon entering a rural village in rural central pa.  approximately 1 to 1 1/2 minutes after pulling off to observe these objects, the trailing object moved what appeared to be very slightly and slowly in an easterly direction and appeared to begin to grow dimmer until it appeared to vanish.  within 30 seconds afterwards, the lead object repeated the same action as the trailing object. these two objects did not seem to be emitting any audible sound at all during the entire event. during the time objects were observed from the roadside, a jet was observed to be flying between and above the objects at an altitude much higher than they. i went to utilize my cell phone to obtain photos but realized that while shopping earlier, my wife had placed my cell phone in her purse, which was in turn placed in one of the saddlebags on our motorcycle.  i unfortunately was unable to obtain photos.  this sighting of these two objects has very much sparked our curiosity and at the same time has given us a very uneasy and unsettling feeling as we know that these two objects cannot come from any origin that we at this time have present knowledge of.  if they are man-made, ie. from any branch of our armed forces etc., i am not aware of them and the capabilities they presented in this sighting.
content.summary: While riding on motorcycle going in southerly direction, observed 2 brightly glowing redish orange objects in night sky in straight-line path with no flashing lights or familiar characteristics.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother was driving me to the filipino store nearby which is around the corner from where i live.  we were stopped at a red light at lampson ave. and brookhurst st. when i saw a 2 to 3 foot in diameter balloon crossing the intersection.  it was blue or blue green with rounded sections.  other drivers did not seem to care about it.  it flew to my right just over my doctor's clinic building.  it flew like an ordinary balloon, but it had a phony looking turned up mouth piece like where you blow air.  when it was about 50 feet from me it brightly reflected the sun.  before it hovered at about 100 feet from me it brightly reflected the sun about 7 times.  soon after it hovered it started fading then the light turned green, and i vividly remember my mother turning right on brookhurst st. hand-over-hand.  then i was viewing my doctor's building, the object and stores nearby facing e where before i was facing n.  the object continued slowly fading, until it vanished into thin air.  then all of a sudden i was on lampson ave.

i was excitedly narrating to my mother everything the ufo was doing.  at first we saw it through the windshield then i saw it from my partially open door window.

my mother does not remember turning right on brookhurst st.  she was out of view of the object, except when it crossed the intersection.  she said nothing about it.

two days later i found red scratch marks on my left arm.  and 3 days later i found a 3" long red scratch mark on my left leg.

in my experience photographing and filming ufos in my area i found sometimes they resemble planes with plane like blinking lights.  so to dismiss a ufo for a blimp, birds or balloons cannot be accurate.
content.summary: A balloon not from this world

content.detailedDescription: On my porch talking to my friend, aug 10 2013 when i seen amber lights moving slow above the neighborhood. then a second set followed the first triangle spaced lights and went into clouds. i went to get my camera and they were gone.. i though that the amber lights odd for commercial air craft.  and the i thought how odd they were flying so close together. the movement was calm and deliberate. i was in awe of the sight and kept reporting what i was seeing to my friend.
content.summary: Two sets of amber lights in triangle shape, moving slow and dissappeared over cloud, nite was clear

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of my house watching for the meteor shower that was supposed to be on tonight.  i noticed a plane - lights blinking, and i could hear the sound of the engine.  i then noticed that there was another light following it, and i thought it odd that 2 airplanes would be in that close proximity together, especially since the airport was quite a bit away and both crafts were high in altitude.  i tried listening for the other engine of what i thought was the other plane.  that light, pure white, then started to descend from the sky, and got bigger and bigger as it approached.  it was like when someone throws a rock, you see it coming, and the closer it gets, the bigger it is. the only weird thing is, it wasn't perfectly round.  it was almost as if it were a teardrop as it came down.  as i realized it was headed right for me (or so it seemed) i started to freak out and added a few choice words to the situation.  i really felt like i was in mortal danger.  the minute i started freaking out, it started ascending back up into the higher altitudes and once again became a pinpoint light and then disappeared.  i came back in the house and pulled the shade shut.  my daughter came in 10 minutes later to tell me it was still out there, cruising around.  there were 5 witnesses to this event.  the young adults were out in the back yard "camping" and had a fire going when this event happened.
content.summary: Moving light descended from sky, then ascended

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog 30 minutes before sunrise.  i was looking at two bright stars close together. to me they were about 1" apart. i noticed maybe 3 small ufo's travelling between the two stars. looked like they were playing. i watched about 10 minutes.  i was smiling because i always wanted to see a ufo. they were zig-zagging out of a straight flight pattern like they were just playing.  for only 2 or 3 seconds they would disappear into the bright star before going back to the other bright star. of the two bright stars, the one on the left was a little more dominating, bigger and brighter, not by much. just at the brink of the pink sun starting to break, a small one shot straigh up and out of sight in less than a milli second. the lesser of the brighter star moved to the left into the bright one and in 2 or 3 seconds just faded away. i just thought whow... i've seen ufo's now...........That's it.
content.summary: Two bright stars with small ufo's zig zagging in between them with one rapid ascent out of sight up

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving on the highway and saw that they looked like the little dipper but it was wrong.
they almost formed the shape of the little dipper but it wasn't completely dark yet and they were too close. plus the formation was a bit off, one was very close to the horizon and ruined the shape. there were no other stars in the sky and these were just glowing so bright.
we thought it might be like a string of lights together, really big lights. they seemed like they were in such a formation, like they were connected but not. 

we stared at them as we were driving. they just looked so interesting. glowing really bright. whitish yellow. they didn't move at all. just hovered. 

they seemed really interesting, like it was hard to look away. we were so curious as to what they were, we backtracked on the highway but they disappeared. it was so disappointing because they were just there and so big and close to the ground.
content.summary: They looked like the little dipper but hovering right above off the highway.

content.detailedDescription: It happens when i'm asleep. don't know when it was but i remember falling asleep and my husband was in the front room watching tv. i remember i was lying on my left side when i fell asleep i had this sharp pain on my back and it felt like someone was drilling on my right lower part something was telling me not to move but talking to me telepathically. it kept saying overand over ddon't move cause the light will go out the pain was so bad i remember moving my shoulder to see what they were doing and as soon as i woke up after that the power went out in my house i culdnt get up cause i couldn't believe it was happening. i waited for about 5 secs i got up to open my down and see if my husband was ok and he asked what just happened. i didn't think anything of it so i went back to bed. i keep have these out of body experiences and seeing this tall hooded figure standing by my bed looking at me. then i stared to right down all the dreams i would have and some of my dreams would be having intercourse with man i can never see it happened a couple of times. and recently on july 6th when my husband was getting ready for work at 4 in the morning i got ip made him his lunch he left when i went back to bed a had a dream that i was giving birth and there was 3 tall figures standing in front of me the one that was right in front of me delivering my baby was wearing a white coat. i gave birth to the baby and i remember them cutting the umbilical cord and it almost looked like on the avitar movie when he put his hair in the horse and those tentacles was wrapping around his hair. after i woke up my stomach was hurting i went to the bathroom and i was gushing out blood. that morning i went outside and there was a large burnt mark on my grass in my back yard. since that day i haven't experienced anything else but i do have pains on my right abdomen area. i took a photo like 1 week later but grass was stating to grow back by then. i also have strange markings on my upper thigh.
content.summary: Didn't see one

content.detailedDescription: After giving case to the sighting at my friends i couldnt see it driving, but i could see the glow lighting up the tops of the trees. i was stopped at the top on seeley rd. that scared me so i drove home. i got home about 10- 10:30pm i was on the phone with my mother who was the only one i knew who would pick up when a light came down the same one i was following, and flew right over head. i felt like it knew i was there, and i was scared i wasnt sure if i should go inside or get in the truck and drive away. instead i stayed on the phone, and watched it. it was soo close and bright when it was right over head, but it kept going so i calmed down. going south due north first. i hung up, and went inside to look for my tripod. i set it up in the yard and at 11:00pm or so it came back this time east to west. i took a photo first then switched it to video and shot almost 2 minutes of video. this might be weird, but i sorta asked it to come back... like kinda prayer, or meditation i'm not sure, but i know somehow i am connected to this.
content.summary: Ufo flies over head flares up then comes back got it on video.

content.detailedDescription:
I smoke a cigarette on my apartment patio each night between ten-thirty and eleven p.M. when i stepped onto my patio i, as always, looked toward the stars. an airplane flew over, flashing its familiar red and white, and then from the northwest i saw a white light, nonblinking, traveling across the sky, towards my northeast. a smaller, also nonblinking white light traveled at a constant distance and speed behind it, probably less than an inch behind the first. after passing directly in front of me, the second, smaller light became hard to see, to the point where i couldn't tell if it had vanished or was still trailing the first. i attribute my loss of visuals to a cloudy night and more light pollution as the lights headed toward fargo. i was able to see the larger, brighter light for a minute or so more before it passed out of my view.
after googling non-flashing, non-blinking white lights with trailing lights, i decided i wasn't sure what i'd seen, but given that i'd seen strange, blinking, hovering lights in the northwestern sky the night or two prior, i thought perhaps the sightings were related.
content.summary: Big white light trailing smaller white light at constant distance

content.detailedDescription:
When i stepped onto my patio for a cigarette i looked starward as usual and immediately noticed two unusual white lights. they were star-sized, and it was impossible to tell how far away or how far up they might have been. they were just inches apart by my view. 
the one on the right one would flash a round white light, then the left one would flash a round white light, the right one would flash, the left one would flash, over and over, but they never moved, they just hovered. 
i finished my cigarette and tried to take a video (unsuccessful), then watched for several more minutes before going inside. it was then about 10:40 p.M. 

about an hour later i went back outside to check on the lights and found that the one on the right was still hovering in the same place and still blinking as if in response to the one that had been on the left, except the light on the left had vanished. man i wish i'd been there to see it take off! 
there's nothing tall around; the only thing behind my apartment complex is a cornfield, but i went out the next day to make sure there aren't any tall structures around that might have blinking lights on top. just as i'd thought, there aren't. there's just one more row of apartments and then farmland for a ways.
content.summary: Two stationary lights blinking at each other, hovered long time

content.detailedDescription: Era un atardecer y yo ven���������������������������a caminando. observe que los rayos del sol al pasara trav���������������������������s de la nube creaban un efecto multicolor impresionante y apresure mi paso para llegar a casa y hacer fotos con mi c���������������������������mara. pens��������������������������� que era muy probable que captara alg���������������������������n objeto puesto que eso sucede con mucha frecuencia en mi caso. apunte y al analizar la foto se ve el objeto en la ampliaci���������������������������n. fotograf���������������������������a a 18 megapixeles. los siento en mi mente, a veces hablan conmigo. sus naves no son visibles al ojo humano pero si a mi intuici���������������������������n. a simple vista no se ven pero yo los localizo mentalmente. el objeto aparece a la izquierda de l a nube.
content.summary: Un punto oscuro a un lado de la nube es en realidad el ovni

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i where out walking our dog after dinner when she said wouldn't it be crazy if we saw a ufo... first thing is we live within the landing approach of jfk airport and in the distance we can see the takeoff of laguadia airport plains so usually the sky is full of plains. with that being said, we both notice a fairly bright light moving east to west. so i said..Like that one boo, she said yea lol. so we both watched it as it went but it was passing other plains in the sky with great speed as it passed behind cloud cover and our  neighbors house so i said said come on lets see if we can see it around the corner. we lost it for maybe 10 seconds. when we saw it again it was below the clouds and moving away from us but still a bright light. so i said no way can we see landing lights if its moveing away from us and it had no flashers as most aircraft do at night. then we noticed another this time it had the traditional two light pattern of a plain on approach  but what made me look again was the speed and its silence as it passed over a lower air plain on its way to jfk and this  was not going towards jfk airport so we both watched the lights travel as far as our eyes can see them once again usually we can see flashers or the landing light even at high altitude you can still make out the flashers both of these did not. then we walked back home. and talked about what we saw .
content.summary: Two separate objects the first with on light te second with two lights moving west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to downtown, from my place in uptown, via loring park. i spotted two objects hovering in the ne sky. at first i didnt pay much attention to them as i thought it was just helicopters perhaps. but then, one looked like it was sort of checking out the basillica. i'm not sure how far away they were, so it may have just been a quirk of viewpoint and unrelated to the basillica. 

that struck me as interesting so i decided to record them with my galaxy note 2 phone. i also tried to get enough reference points in some of the shots to triangulate size if someone is interested in doing so. i'm not sure what the objects were. i'm inclined to think they were manmade. they werent helicopters though, at least not normal sized ones.. nor did they have the correct lights for that sort of vehicle. (perhaps i'm mistaken?)

the objects themselves were dual colors. they looked like two square lights of some sort attached to one another, which you cant tell from the video due to the low quality. if i remember correctly the colors were a solid blue and green, but dont quote me on that... i cant recall for sure. in the video each object appears a different color versus each being a dual color.

before i started to record, the second object had been hovering back and forth. it's the object you see hover up from the lower left in the video.

my feelings and reactions: curiosity more than anything. like i said, i think it was probably something of terrestrial origin and someone either testing out some kind of say.. drone, or something, or putting on a show of some sort with rc craft. they kind of reminded me of those small automated drones from some of the universities you see videos of doing synchronized flying. that or perhaps small rc craft (but silent).  at first i thought there might be some sort of propeller sound, but it was just downtown noise.. as i made my way downtown no one else seemed to have noticed anything. (it was busy downtown)

how did i lose sight of the objects? see the video. they did their thing and then flew off. the second one looked like it had been landing or taking off before i started recording. its hard to tell for sure though without a better idea of distance though.
content.summary: Two multicolored objects, hovering and changing directions, ne of basilica. see video.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was leaving a friends house when i saw it. i called him out through the front window to come look. i wanted to know if it was the same light he had seen before. 
2. instinct, intuition a gut feeling perhaps i just knew it was there. 
3. at first i thought chinese lantern until it sped up and got brighter winds were out of the sw this was going e to nw. 
4. the object was bright white, and would flare up double the size. the other object i only seen for a moment it was directly above starlike, and changed directions abruptly. 
5. very calm a bit mad when it drained my battery again, but the camera kept working. interest. 
6. went behind some trees, and i drove in the general direction but never saw it.
content.summary: Lights over cadillac

content.detailedDescription: Both my mother and i were going to santa barbara this morning, so i woke up at 4:00 a.M. as i passed by the kitchen window, i looked out and saw an orb. it was hovering about approx. 7 miles away over a little city of paso robles, ca. i stood there and watched for awhile, i lost track of time. my mother walked into the kitchen and i told her to look. both her and i saw the most beautiful colors of blue, orange and yellow it was an orb hovering. it would move left and then right real fast, then came towards us i felt it knew we were watching it... then all of a sudden it moved backward and went  upward real fast. i could not belive the speed, then it was gone. i will never forget this experience. i didn't ever talk about it to anyone. it was back in the year of 1969 and you didn't talk about things like that then. my mother has now passed on...
content.summary: Looked like it was over the city of paso robles,ca hoovering then bouncing back and forth . it came straight toward me went backwards and took off up word out of site fast , real fast . was turning different shades of color, blue, orange and yellow.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving in the car to the home and i look out of the window of the car it was about 11 and the half and first thing i saw is an object that is "standing" on the air it was red-orange color and first i thught maybe a star has explode but when we stoped i saw some blue orb hading to that object and it was standing and looking at it then the orb is starting to going to city nutt losing the site.And that big red triangle was just standing there and desepares!!?? i was like "i must tell someone and i tell my cousin he said that is might an airloplane buttte airoplane go slower and i dosent desepares. i feel now like i need to do something to show world a truth that we are not alone!
content.summary: Red flying object then come blue orb

content.detailedDescription: I was sunbathing in atlanta, ga and was about to go inside around 5:30 p.M. i glanced up, and clear as day ... there was a dark object hovering in the sky ... i looked away repeatedly to verify what i was seeing ... i even tried to film it to no avail ... it just sat there for over 45 seconds ... motionless.
content.summary: Darkish oblong object hovered motionless for 45 seconds plus ... then vanishised

content.detailedDescription: I just got home and took my dog out to potty in the backyard, i was throwing the ball for her when i noticed a black orb approaching from the west, it was circular in shape, but slowly pitching itself to become more of a slit shape. i looked down to see if i had my cellphone to take a picture but i did not. when i looked back up i saw 5-6 of these objects in the same vicinity, all of the same shape and size, they were pitch black in color against the cloud cover. i stood stupified trying to figure out what they were, called my roommate out to see them. he said "maybe there's something burning and it's airborne debris flying over." they were not fluttering or changing direction so i dismissed that immediately. it was not a balloon, blimp, or aircraft as there were no lights visible. 4-5 of the objects began to change light path (which was slow and deliberate) to the south, which would have taken their flight path directly over pdx airport. one of the objects began to descend, maybe 500-1000 ft. as i saw it get bigger. i would estimate the altitude somewhere between 2000'-5000' it was hard to tell with no reference point. my dog was whining uncontrollably, and i got a very eerie, unsettled feeling. it almost seemed as if it descended for me to see it better. i ran inside to get my phone to take a video, maybe 15 seconds before i got back outside and the 4-5 objects that had changed direction disappeared, only the first one that i saw remained. by this time it was almost directly over my house, at which time it changed direction to the southern sky, following the same path as the others.  i was able to get a short blurry video, which i will try and figure out how to upload. i followed the object for maybe another 5-8 minutes as it finally got far enough away to lose sight, there was bright, white cloud cover so it was hard to keep focus on it for too long.  i would consider myself a skeptic at best, as i have never in my life experienced something like this, but it had a very profound effect on me. i remain unsettled as to what i saw. hopefully someone else saw the same thing so i know i'm not crazy.
content.summary: 5-6 black orbs appeared from the western sky, together, then took separate paths s/se direction
